thread.title: Patrick
thread.title_full: Sunshine Pillows and Sunny Bay Heating Pads by BioMed DB Design, LLC reviewed by Patrick

author: Patrick
title: Patrick
text: Love the pillow, especially since it holds your neck in place if you fall asleep traveling - no kink in your neck when you wake. Bought an extra for 90 year old parent and it has improved her comfort immensely when relaxing and watching TV. Buy this pillow now, you will not regret it.
